structure.unit: ARTICLE IV. COMMUNITY ANTENNA TELEVISION SYSTEMS

law.catch_line: Filing and communications with regulatory agencies.

text.section:
Sec. 8A-142. Filing and communications with regulatory agencies.
Copies of all petitions, applications and communications submitted by the Licensee to the Federal Communications Commission, Securities and Exchange Commission, or any other federal or State regulatory Commission or agency having jurisdiction in respect to any matters affecting CATV operations authorized pursuant to a License granted under this article, shall also be submitted simultaneously to the County Manager.
